articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: 'Cyberpunk 2077' Will Be Free To Play For A Bit, Here's How To Get It - Forbes
articles.description: CDPR has decided that they want as many people as humanly possible to play Cyberpunk 2077. So it's going free for a short bit.
articles.content:
Cyberpunk 2077
CDPR
CDPR has decided that they want as many people as humanly possible to play Cyberpunk 2077. Thats why in a few days, they will offer part of the game for free on current gen cons… [+2431 chars]
